item.title: GOODRICH PETROLEUM CORP S-1
item.description: GOODRICH PETROLEUM CORP, which is in the Crude Petroleum & Natural Gas [1311] industry, SEC S-1 filing on May 07, 2021 had 41798 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: lien - 798 instances company - 628 instances notes - 530 instances obligations - 495 instances subsidiary - 484 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
